resources.string: You do not have movies on your Watchlist. \nOn the bottom right you can add new titles!
You do not have movies on your Watchedlist. \nGo ahead and watch some!

Cineaste is an Open Source project of two computer science students. The main feature of the app is to find easily movies for a shared movie night. Via the "Matching"-Button your mobile phone searches for friends in your surroundings and suggests the movies, which you all would like to watch.

 The data is transmitted via Bluetooth. This means all your movies are stored securely on your phone and stays there. The data will be only shared in your living room between your friends!

 Cineaste is still at its beginning and there could be some problems sometimes. We will do our best to make this experience as good as possible, therefore we need your feedback. Please leave a comment at the Play Store or develop Cineaste together with us! Via the GitHub icon you can find the sources of Cineaste. The movie data you see is provided by TMDb. Go ahead and check them out!

 Special thanks to Philipp Wolf, for the design!
